name: Dal Makhani
ingredients: whole black gram lentils and red kidney beans, onions, tomatoes, green chilies, coriander, ginger-garlic paste, butter, cumin seeds, cloves green, cardamoms, cinnamon, red chili powder, salt
steps: Soak both ¾ cup whole black gram lentils and ¼ cup kidney beans overnight in enough water for 8 to 9 hours.
Pressure cook until the lentils and kidney beans have softened.
Blend a smooth puree of 2 tomatoes.
In a pan, heat 3 tablespoons butter and add the whole spices.
After 2 minutes add chopped onions and saute the onions till they become light golden.
Add the prepared tomato puree and cook for 5 minutes on low heat.
Add the cooked lentils and mix well.
Add water according to match the desired density and cook for 10 to 15 minutes.
Garnish with extra coriander and serve with rice or bread.
